title: 15/4/2016 - Friends list & chat issues
body:
**UPDATE 22:30**
We've made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue.  Let us know if it is fixed!



> **Original Post**
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of some issues with the chat system which are causing player's friends lists to not display correctly or at all.
> 
> We're working on it now so stay tuned for updates.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar

replies.body:
Hi again folks

We've just made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue.  Let us know if it is fixed!

Cheers
Mindstar

Thank you it works 

What was the problem?
im not seeing my chat or online or offline friends its not even there located on the screen please help
I haven't had any problems with this until i logged on a few minutes ago. I was playing earlier and my friends list was there but now it is when i log back on a few hours later
It isn't fixed for my computer yet :/
is the /eq command a legit option during a game or is it a rumor

Hey guys, after this update, my _**Friend list became empty**_. Anyone having the same issue?
Anyone knows how to fix it? Someone save me plz~~~~{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
thanks god, the list is coming back. i dont need to play alone! Hurry!!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Wait, is it the chat in game or a Club chat???

This is the outside of game chat - eg clubs / shared channels / friends list etc.

Chat in game should be fine :)

Cheers
Mindstar
Are there supposed to be public chats or is that part of the bug?

Public chats should be working too - I'm in one now. Are you trying to join a new one, or is it one you usually enter on startup of the client?

One thing I'd suggest if you're having issues though still - try logging out/in as we just made a change that might fix this up.

Cheers
Mindstar
Im trying to join one and there is nothing to select besides 'Join a Chat Room' And yes I have re-logged in a few moments ago.
If I'm understanding right - and you are looking for a list of rooms (let me know if I'm wrong) - that list was removed many months ago.  The way to join a public room now is to type its name.
Ohhhhhh, you are right, I just didn't know that the rooms were removed. :/ Can you give me one to see if I join? Please.
Bruh someone give me a name change so I don't have to listen to people sing the song Hello
Is it me you're looking for?
I can see it in your eyes
I can see it in your smile
You're all I've ever wanted
why there are so many problem everyday?
My friends list is wiped :/ aswell as my clubs it says im the only one online in my clubs. :c hurry up i hate playing alone Q.Q{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Hi

Can you try logging in again?  We've just made some changes that might fix the issue.

Cheers
Mindstar
ONLY NOOBS GET THIS BUG
Savage
